prompt: Transform this paragraph without altering its tone or meaning.
input_text:
My last purchase of 4 cases of this food had a sour off- smell. Called natural balance customer service, they said they hadn't received complaints about that batch, they'd pass info along to tech dept, they'd send me a coupon for 1 case.... But, it's a natural product, and variation "was to be expected". They suggested I return it to the retailer. Paying for shipping 3 times (receiving, sending back, receiving again) for a heavy product like this makes it very expensive.
I've fed this variety to my 3 cats for a year (alternate with Natural Balance Ultra), and they have always loved it. They will only eat this batch if they are very very hungry. I can barely stand to open the cans. All other batches had a clean fresh smell.
I'm disapointed with the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium priced product. (I have 3 cats). I won't buy from Natural Balance again. I'll use the coupon locally, and make sure I'm mixing production runs.
completion_text: my previous purchase of four cases of this food had an unpleasantly sour smell. when i contacted natural balance customer service, they informed me that they hadn't received complaints about that particular batch, but would pass the information along to their technical department. they offered a coupon for one case, claiming that natural products can exhibit variations in odor and quality. the representative suggested i return it to the retailer, at my own expense, due to its weight and shipping costs. this is not the first time i've fed this variety to my three cats; they have always enjoyed it, alternating between natural balance ultra. however, this batch has a strong, unappealing odor that even my very hungry cats can't tolerate. in contrast, all other batches had a clean, fresh smell. i'm disappointed with the customer service response to a quality issue from a loyal and premium-paying customer (i own three cats). following this experience, i won't be purchasing from natural balance again. i'll use the coupon locally and ensure i'm mixing production runs in the future.

With all the other products out there, I don't think I will be purchasing this one again.

prompt: Transform this paragraph without altering its tone or meaning.
input_text: I have 7 dogs.  All various breeds and sizes.  I was looking for a brand without additives that all my dogs would benefit from.  I have a few that need to lose weight. I but the Healthy weightCORE for my "dieters" and mix it with canned green beans or peas and carrots.  So far my Golden, who was an overweight rescue at 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds -- she's been on this food for about 7 months.  I buy the original CORE version for my baby bulldog, who had a lot of gas.  No more smells and ripples in the night!  Amazon has the best price for Wellness. All my dogs are healthy and have nice shiny coats.  Priceless!  Wellness now has a SIMPLE version for those dogs who suffer with food allergies.  A family member has a little Teddy Bear with severe skin issues -- she'd scratch until raw and bloody.  She switched to the SIMPLE version of Wellness and has been itch free ever since.  Again...great brand!

prompt: Rewrite this sentence ensuring the sentiment remains unchanged.
input_text: I have 7 dogs.  All various breeds and sizes.  I was looking for a brand without additives that all my dogs would benefit from.  I have a few that need to lose weight.  Wellness makes the best product.  I buy the small bites for my little ones....pieces are small and they love it. So far my Golden, who was an overweight rescue at 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds -- she's been on this food for about 7 months.  I buy the original CORE version for my baby bulldog, who had a lot of gas.  No more smells and ripples in the night!  Amazon has the best price for Wellness. All my dogs are healthy and have nice shiny coats.  Priceless!  Wellness now has a SIMPLE version for those dogs who suffer with food allergies.  A family member has a little Teddy Bear with severe skin issues -- she'd scratch until raw and bloody.  She switched to the SIMPLE version of Wellness and has been itch free ever since.  Again...great brand!

prompt: Paraphrase this passage without changing its meaning.
input_text:
My last purchase of 4 cases of this food had a sour off- smell. Called natural balance customer service, they said they hadn't received complaints about that batch, they'd pass info along to tech dept, they'd send me a coupon for 1 case.... But, it's a natural product, and variation "was to be expected". They suggested I return it to the retailer. Paying for shipping 3 times (receiving, sending back, receiving again) for a heavy product like this makes it very expensive.
I've fed this variety to my 3 cats for a year (alternate with Natural Balance Ultra), and they have always loved it. They will only eat this batch if they are very very hungry. I can barely stand to open the cans. All other batches had a clean fresh smell.
I'm disapointed with the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium priced product. (I have 3 cats). I won't buy from Natural Balance again. I'll use the coupon locally, and make sure I'm mixing production runs.
completion_text: my recent purchase of four cases of this food had an unpleasant sour odor. when i contacted natural balance's customer service, they claimed not to have received any complaints about that particular batch, but offered to pass along the information to their technical department and sent a coupon for one case. however, as it's a natural product, they suggested that variation was expected and advised me to return it to the retailer at my own expense. i've been feeding this variety to my three cats for a year, alternating with natural balance ultra, and they've always loved it. but they only eat this batch when extremely hungry, and i can barely stand the smell of the cans. all other batches had a fresh, clean scent. i'm disappointed in the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium-priced product.

With all the other products out there, I don't think I will be purchasing this one again.

With all the other products out there, I don't think I will be purchasing this one again.

prompt: Simplify this passage retaining the original sentiment.
input_text:
My last purchase of 4 cases of this food had a sour off- smell. Called natural balance customer service, they said they hadn't received complaints about that batch, they'd pass info along to tech dept, they'd send me a coupon for 1 case.... But, it's a natural product, and variation "was to be expected". They suggested I return it to the retailer. Paying for shipping 3 times (receiving, sending back, receiving again) for a heavy product like this makes it very expensive.
I've fed this variety to my 3 cats for a year (alternate with Natural Balance Ultra), and they have always loved it. They will only eat this batch if they are very very hungry. I can barely stand to open the cans. All other batches had a clean fresh smell.
I'm disapointed with the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium priced product. (I have 3 cats). I won't buy from Natural Balance again. I'll use the coupon locally, and make sure I'm mixing production runs.
completion_text: my last purchase had a sour off-smell. natural balance customer service said they hadn't received complaints about that batch but would pass info to tech dept and send a coupon for 1 case. they suggested i return it to the retailer, paying for shipping three times. i've fed this variety to my cats for a year with no issues, but this batch has a strong odor. i'm disappointed with the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium priced product.

prompt: Simplify this passage retaining the original sentiment.
input_text:
I was expecting something more.

Blueberries - Very small pieces, and not many of them.

Clusters - Where did they go?! When you look at the pictures of this product, and other types of their granola, it would appear that you are getting a bag of large clusters. Not the case, there are almost no clusters. The biggest cluster I found in all 3 bags was the size of a dime.

Taste - Good, when you get some of everything.

With all the other products out there, I don't think I will be purchasing this one again.
completion_text: i expected more. blueberries are small and scarce. clusters are almost non-existent, despite pictures showing large ones. taste is good when you get a mix of everything. i won't buy it again due to other options available.

prompt: Simplify this passage retaining the original sentiment.
input_text: I have 7 dogs.  All various breeds and sizes.  I was looking for a brand without additives that all my dogs would benefit from.  I have a few that need to lose weight.  Wellness makes the best product.  I buy the small bites for my little ones....pieces are small and they love it.  I but the Healthy weightCORE for my "dieters" and mix it with canned green beans or peas and carrots.  So far my Golden, who was an overweight rescue at 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds -- she's been on this food for about 7 months.  I buy the original CORE version for my baby bulldog, who had a lot of gas.  No more smells and ripples in the night!  Amazon has the best price for Wellness. And its shipped right to my home -- no lugging big bags back and forth.  Yes, it's more expensive than the other stuff--but it really works.  And that will cut down on future vet bills.  All my dogs are healthy and have nice shiny coats.  Priceless!  Wellness now has a SIMPLE version for those dogs who suffer with food allergies.  A family member has a little Teddy Bear with severe skin issues -- she'd scratch until raw and bloody.  She switched to the SIMPLE version of Wellness and has been itch free ever since.  Again...great brand!
completion_text: i have 7 dogs, all different breeds and sizes. i was looking for an additive-free food that would benefit them all. some need to lose weight. wellness makes the best product. for small ones, i buy the small bites; they love it. for dieters, i mix healthy weight core with canned veggies. my golden has lost 19 pounds in 7 months on this food. the original core version helps my baby bulldog's gas issues. amazon has the best price and ships right to my door. it's more expensive, but it works and saves on vet bills. all my dogs are healthy and have shiny coats. wellness now offers a simple version for food-allergic dogs; it's helped a family member's teddy bear with severe skin issues. great brand!

prompt: Paraphrase this content while keeping its meaning unchanged.
input_text:
My last purchase of 4 cases of this food had a sour off- smell. Called natural balance customer service, they said they hadn't received complaints about that batch, they'd pass info along to tech dept, they'd send me a coupon for 1 case.... But, it's a natural product, and variation "was to be expected". They suggested I return it to the retailer. Paying for shipping 3 times (receiving, sending back, receiving again) for a heavy product like this makes it very expensive.
I've fed this variety to my 3 cats for a year (alternate with Natural Balance Ultra), and they have always loved it. They will only eat this batch if they are very very hungry. I can barely stand to open the cans. All other batches had a clean fresh smell.
I'm disapointed with the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium priced product. (I have 3 cats). I won't buy from Natural Balance again. I'll use the coupon locally, and make sure I'm mixing production runs.
completion_text: my recent purchase of four cases of this food had a sour off-smell. i contacted natural balance customer service, who informed me they hadn't received complaints about that batch, would pass the information along to their tech department, and send me a coupon for one case. however, being a natural product, variation was expected. they suggested returning it to the retailer, but paying three times for shipping on this heavy product is expensive. i've fed this variety to my three cats for a year (alternating with natural balance ultra), and they always loved it. this batch alone makes them only eat it when very hungry; all other batches had a clean fresh smell. i'm disappointed in the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium-priced product.

prompt: Paraphrase this content while keeping its meaning unchanged.
input_text:
I was expecting something more.

Blueberries - Very small pieces, and not many of them.

Clusters - Where did they go?! When you look at the pictures of this product, and other types of their granola, it would appear that you are getting a bag of large clusters. Not the case, there are almost no clusters. The biggest cluster I found in all 3 bags was the size of a dime.

Taste - Good, when you get some of everything.

With all the other products out there, I don't think I will be purchasing this one again.
completion_text: i was anticipating something more substantial. the blueberries are tiny and scarce. clusters are nowhere to be found; the pictures deceive, promising large clusters, but the reality is that almost none exist, with the largest i found being a dime-sized piece. the taste is good when you manage to get a mix of everything. however, considering the numerous other products available, i don't think i'll be repurchasing this one.

prompt: Paraphrase this content while keeping its meaning unchanged.
input_text: I have 7 dogs.  All various breeds and sizes.  I was looking for a brand without additives that all my dogs would benefit from.  I have a few that need to lose weight.  Wellness makes the best product.  I buy the small bites for my little ones....pieces are small and they love it.  I but the Healthy weightCORE for my "dieters" and mix it with canned green beans or peas and carrots.  So far my Golden, who was an overweight rescue at 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds -- she's been on this food for about 7 months.  I buy the original CORE version for my baby bulldog, who had a lot of gas.  No more smells and ripples in the night!  Amazon has the best price for Wellness. And its shipped right to my home -- no lugging big bags back and forth.  Yes, it's more expensive than the other stuff--but it really works.  And that will cut down on future vet bills.  All my dogs are healthy and have nice shiny coats.  Priceless!  Wellness now has a SIMPLE version for those dogs who suffer with food allergies.  A family member has a little Teddy Bear with severe skin issues -- she'd scratch until raw and bloody.  She switched to the SIMPLE version of Wellness and has been itch free ever since.  Again...great brand!
completion_text: i have seven dogs, each with a unique breed and size. i've been searching for a pet food without additives that would benefit all my dogs equally. some of them need to lose weight, so i opted for wellness, which produces the best product in my opinion. for my smaller dogs, i buy the small bites, as they love its small pieces. my larger dogs receive healthy weight core, mixed with canned green beans or peas and carrots. one of my goldens, an overweight rescue at 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds over seven months on this diet. i also use the original core version for my baby bulldog, who suffered from gas issues, which have since subsided. amazon offers the best price for wellness, with convenient home delivery, eliminating the need to lug heavy bags. although more expensive than other brands, wellness really works and can reduce future vet bills. all my dogs are healthy and sport nice coats, which is priceless. additionally, wellness now offers a simple version for dogs with food allergies, which has helped a family member's teddy bear with severe skin issues, who was previously itchy until raw and bloody. once again, i highly recommend wellness as a great brand.

I but the Healthy weightCORE for my "dieters" and mix it with canned green beans or peas and carrots.  So far my Golden, who was an overweight rescue at 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds -- she's been on this food for about 7 months.  I buy the original CORE version for my baby bulldog, who had a lot of gas.  No more smells and ripples in the night!  Amazon has the best price for Wellness. And its shipped right to my home -- no lugging big bags back and forth.  Yes, it's more expensive than the other stuff--but it really works.  And that will cut down on future vet bills.  All my dogs are healthy and have nice shiny coats.  Priceless!  Wellness now has a SIMPLE version for those dogs who suffer with food allergies.  A family member has a little Teddy Bear with severe skin issues -- she'd scratch until raw and bloody.  She switched to the SIMPLE version of Wellness and has been itch free ever since.  Again...great brand!
completion_text: i have seven dogs, all different breeds and sizes. i've been searching for a brand without additives that would benefit them all. some need to lose weight, so i opted for wellness. i buy the small bites for my smaller ones - they love the small pieces. for my dieters, i mix healthy weight core with canned green beans or peas and carrots. my golden, an overweight rescue at 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds after being on this food for about seven months. i also use the original core version for my baby bulldog, who had gas issues. no more smells or ripples at night! amazon offers the best price for wellness, and it ships right to my door - no lugging big bags around. while it's more expensive, it really works and will cut down on future vet bills. all my dogs are healthy with nice shiny coats - priceless! wellness now has a simple version for dogs with food allergies. a family member's teddy bear had severe skin issues, scratching until raw and bloody. she switched to the simple version of wellness and has been itch-free ever since. again, great brand!

prompt: Simplify this passage retaining the original sentiment.
input_text:
My last purchase of 4 cases of this food had a sour off- smell. Called natural balance customer service, they said they hadn't received complaints about that batch, they'd pass info along to tech dept, they'd send me a coupon for 1 case.... But, it's a natural product, and variation "was to be expected". They suggested I return it to the retailer. Paying for shipping 3 times (receiving, sending back, receiving again) for a heavy product like this makes it very expensive.
I've fed this variety to my 3 cats for a year (alternate with Natural Balance Ultra), and they have always loved it. They will only eat this batch if they are very very hungry. I can barely stand to open the cans. All other batches had a clean fresh smell.
I'm disapointed with the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium priced product. (I have 3 cats). I won't buy from Natural Balance again. I'll use the coupon locally, and make sure I'm mixing production runs.
completion_text: my last purchase had a sour off-smell. natural balance customer service said they hadn't received complaints about that batch, but i've fed this variety to my 3 cats for a year with no issues until now. they suggested returning it to the retailer, but paying for shipping three times is expensive. i'm disappointed in their response and won't buy from them again.

prompt: Simplify this passage retaining the original sentiment.
input_text:

Blueberries - Very small pieces, and not many of them.

Clusters - Where did they go?! When you look at the pictures of this product, and other types of their granola, it would appear that you are getting a bag of large clusters. Not the case, there are almost no clusters. The biggest cluster I found in all 3 bags was the size of a dime.

Taste - Good, when you get some of everything.

With all the other products out there, I don't think I will be purchasing this one again.
completion_text: i expected more. blueberries are small and scarce. clusters are nowhere to be found, despite pictures showing large ones. taste is good when mixed with other ingredients. i won't buy it again due to poor quality.

Paying for shipping 3 times (receiving, sending back, receiving again) for a heavy product like this makes it very expensive.
I've fed this variety to my 3 cats for a year (alternate with Natural Balance Ultra), and they have always loved it. They will only eat this batch if they are very very hungry. I can barely stand to open the cans. All other batches had a clean fresh smell.
I'm disapointed with the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium priced product. (I have 3 cats). I won't buy from Natural Balance again. I'll use the coupon locally, and make sure I'm mixing production runs.

prompt: Rewrite this paragraph while keeping the same tone and meaning.
input_text:
My last purchase of 4 cases of this food had a sour off- smell. Called natural balance customer service, they said they hadn't received complaints about that batch, they'd pass info along to tech dept, they'd send me a coupon for 1 case.... But, it's a natural product, and variation "was to be expected". They suggested I return it to the retailer. Paying for shipping 3 times (receiving, sending back, receiving again) for a heavy product like this makes it very expensive.
I've fed this variety to my 3 cats for a year (alternate with Natural Balance Ultra), and they have always loved it. They will only eat this batch if they are very very hungry. I can barely stand to open the cans. All other batches had a clean fresh smell.
I'm disapointed with the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium priced product. (I have 3 cats). I won't buy from Natural Balance again. I'll use the coupon locally, and make sure I'm mixing production runs.
completion_text: my last purchase of four cases had a sour, off-putting smell. i called natural balance customer service, who said they hadn't received complaints about that batch, but would pass along the information to their tech department. they offered a coupon for one case, citing natural product variation as an explanation. however, they suggested i return it to the retailer, incurring shipping costs three times for a heavy product like this, which is very expensive. i've fed this variety to my three cats for a year, alternating with natural balance ultra, and they always loved it. they'll only eat this batch when extremely hungry. the smell is unbearable. all other batches had a clean, fresh scent. i'm disappointed in the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium-priced product. i won't be buying from natural balance again; instead, i'll use the coupon locally and ensure i mix production runs.

prompt: Rewrite this paragraph while keeping the same tone and meaning.
input_text:
I bought this when i was hungry and on a whim.
there was this subscribe and save deal going on.

I like the nuts, i hate the carmel. Overall, it was too sweet for me. and now i have 6 boxes of it.
But it does work wonders when i'm hungry.
completion_text: i bought this impulsively while i was craving something to eat. there was a subscribe and save promotion going on at the time. i enjoy the nuts, but dislike the caramel. unfortunately, the entire mix was too sweet for my taste. now, i have six boxes of it. however, when i'm hungry, it does its job remarkably well.

prompt: Rewrite this paragraph while keeping the same tone and meaning.
input_text:
I was expecting something more.

Blueberries - Very small pieces, and not many of them.

Clusters - Where did they go?! When you look at the pictures of this product, and other types of their granola, it would appear that you are getting a bag of large clusters. Not the case, there are almost no clusters. The biggest cluster I found in all 3 bags was the size of a dime.

Taste - Good, when you get some of everything.

With all the other products out there, I don't think I will be purchasing this one again.
completion_text: i was expecting something more. blueberries - very small pieces, and not many of them. clusters - where did they go?! the pictures show large clusters, but in reality, almost none exist. the largest cluster i found was the size of a dime. taste is good when you get some of everything. with all other products out there, i don't think i'll be purchasing this one again.

completion_text: the product was good, but i soon found that ordering something by the pound would be more cost-effective to purchase from my local supplier, even with a slightly higher price. unless you're close to a homebrew store, this might not be the best approach.

prompt: Rewrite this paragraph while keeping the same tone and meaning.
input_text: I have 7 dogs.  All various breeds and sizes.  I was looking for a brand without additives that all my dogs would benefit from.  I have a few that need to lose weight.  Wellness makes the best product.  I buy the small bites for my little ones....pieces are small and they love it.  I but the Healthy weightCORE for my "dieters" and mix it with canned green beans or peas and carrots.  So far my Golden, who was an overweight rescue at 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds -- she's been on this food for about 7 months.  I buy the original CORE version for my baby bulldog, who had a lot of gas.  No more smells and ripples in the night!  Amazon has the best price for Wellness. And its shipped right to my home -- no lugging big bags back and forth.  Yes, it's more expensive than the other stuff--but it really works.  And that will cut down on future vet bills.  All my dogs are healthy and have nice shiny coats.  Priceless!  Wellness now has a SIMPLE version for those dogs who suffer with food allergies.  A family member has a little Teddy Bear with severe skin issues -- she'd scratch until raw and bloody.  She switched to the SIMPLE version of Wellness and has been itch free ever since.  Again...great brand!
completion_text: i have seven dogs, each with unique breeds and sizes. i sought a premium pet food without additives that would benefit all my furry friends equally. some need to shed pounds, so wellness makes the best product for me. for my smaller dogs, i buy their small bites; they adore the bite-sized pieces. my weight-conscious pups enjoy healthy weight core mixed with canned veggies. so far, my 129-pound golden retriever has lost 19 pounds after being on this food for seven months. i also use original core for my gas-prone bulldog; no more midnight odors! amazon offers the best wellness price and ships directly to my doorstep, saving me from lugging heavy bags. yes, it's pricier than others, but it really works, reducing future vet bills. all my dogs are healthy with radiant coats   priceless! wellness now has a simple version for dogs struggling with food allergies; a family member's teddy bear, plagued by severe skin issues, is itch-free after switching to this new formula. great brand, indeed!

prompt: Rewrite this paragraph while keeping the same tone and meaning.
input_text:
My last purchase of 4 cases of this food had a sour off- smell. But, it's a natural product, and variation "was to be expected". They suggested I return it to the retailer. Paying for shipping 3 times (receiving, sending back, receiving again) for a heavy product like this makes it very expensive.
I've fed this variety to my 3 cats for a year (alternate with Natural Balance Ultra), and they have always loved it. They will only eat this batch if they are very very hungry. I can barely stand to open the cans. All other batches had a clean fresh smell.
I'm disapointed with the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium priced product. (I have 3 cats). I won't buy from Natural Balance again. I'll use the coupon locally, and make sure I'm mixing production runs.
completion_text: my last purchase of four cases had a sour off-smell. when i called natural balance customer service, they said they hadn't received complaints about that batch, but would pass the information along to their tech department and send me a coupon for one case. however, as it's a natural product, variation is expected. they suggested returning it to the retailer, at my own expense, which would involve paying for shipping three times for a heavy product like this. i've been feeding this variety to my three cats for a year, alternating with natural balance ultra, and they always loved it. but this batch only gets eaten when they're extremely hungry, as the smell is barely tolerable. all other batches had a clean, fresh scent. i'm disappointed in the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium-priced product. with three cats, i won't be buying from natural balance again. i'll use the coupon locally and ensure i mix production runs.

With all the other products out there, I don't think I will be purchasing this one again.

prompt: Rewrite this paragraph while keeping the same tone and meaning.
input_text:
My last purchase of 4 cases of this food had a sour off- smell. I'm disapointed with the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium priced product. (I have 3 cats). I won't buy from Natural Balance again. I'll use the coupon locally, and make sure I'm mixing production runs.

prompt: Rephrase this text without altering its core message.

prompt: Rephrase this text without altering its core message.
input_text: I have 7 dogs.  All various breeds and sizes.  I was looking for a brand without additives that all my dogs would benefit from.  I have a few that need to lose weight.  Wellness makes the best product.  I buy the small bites for my little ones....pieces are small and they love it.  I but the Healthy weightCORE for my "dieters" and mix it with canned green beans or peas and carrots.  So far my Golden, who was an overweight rescue at 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds -- she's been on this food for about 7 months.  I buy the original CORE version for my baby bulldog, who had a lot of gas.  No more smells and ripples in the night!  Amazon has the best price for Wellness. And its shipped right to my home -- no lugging big bags back and forth.  Yes, it's more expensive than the other stuff--but it really works.  And that will cut down on future vet bills.  All my dogs are healthy and have nice shiny coats.  Priceless!  Wellness now has a SIMPLE version for those dogs who suffer with food allergies.  A family member has a little Teddy Bear with severe skin issues -- she'd scratch until raw and bloody.  She switched to the SIMPLE version of Wellness and has been itch free ever since.  Again...great brand!
completion_text: i have 7 dogs, various breeds and sizes. i was looking for a brand without additives that all my dogs would benefit from. i have a few that need to lose weight. wellness makes the best product. i buy the small bites for my little ones, pieces are small and they love it. i but the healthy weight core for my dieters and mix it with canned green beans or peas and carrots. my golden, who was an overweight rescue at 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds after being on this food for about 7 months. i buy the original core version for my baby bulldog, who had a lot of gas. no more smells and ripples in the night! amazon has the best price for wellness and ships right to my home - no lugging big bags back and forth. it's more expensive than other stuff, but it really works and will cut down on future vet bills. all my dogs are healthy and have nice shiny coats. wellness now has a simple version for those dogs who suffer with food allergies. a family member has a little teddy bear with severe skin issues - she'd scratch until raw and bloody. she switched to the simple version of wellness and has been itch-free ever since. again, great brand!

prompt: Rewrite this statement preserving the original sentiment.
input_text:
My last purchase of 4 cases of this food had a sour off- smell. Called natural balance customer service, they said they hadn't received complaints about that batch, they'd pass info along to tech dept, they'd send me a coupon for 1 case.... But, it's a natural product, and variation "was to be expected". They suggested I return it to the retailer. Paying for shipping 3 times (receiving, sending back, receiving again) for a heavy product like this makes it very expensive.
I've fed this variety to my 3 cats for a year (alternate with Natural Balance Ultra), and they have always loved it. They will only eat this batch if they are very very hungry. I can barely stand to open the cans. All other batches had a clean fresh smell.
I'm disapointed with the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium priced product. (I have 3 cats). I won't buy from Natural Balance again. I'll use the coupon locally, and make sure I'm mixing production runs.
completion_text: my last purchase of 4 cases had a sour off-smell. natural balance customer service said they hadn't received complaints about that batch, would pass info to tech dept, send me a coupon for 1 case. they suggested i return it to the retailer, paying shipping 3 times for a heavy product like this makes it very expensive.

prompt: Rephrase this text without altering its core message.
input_text:
My last purchase of 4 cases of this food had a sour off- smell. Called natural balance customer service, they said they hadn't received complaints about that batch, they'd pass info along to tech dept, they'd send me a coupon for 1 case.... But, it's a natural product, and variation "was to be expected". They suggested I return it to the retailer. Paying for shipping 3 times (receiving, sending back, receiving again) for a heavy product like this makes it very expensive.
I've fed this variety to my 3 cats for a year (alternate with Natural Balance Ultra), and they have always loved it. They will only eat this batch if they are very very hungry. I can barely stand to open the cans. All other batches had a clean fresh smell.
I'm disapointed with the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium priced product. (I have 3 cats). I won't buy from Natural Balance again. I'll use the coupon locally, and make sure I'm mixing production runs.
completion_text: my last purchase of 4 cases had a sour off-smell. natural balance customer service said they hadn't received complaints about that batch, would pass info to tech dept, and send me a coupon for 1 case. they suggested i return it to the retailer, paying for shipping three times makes it expensive. i've fed this variety to my 3 cats for a year, but they only eat this batch when very hungry. all other batches had a clean fresh smell. i'm disappointed with customer service response to quality issue from heavy user of their premium priced product. i won't buy from natural balance again, will use the coupon locally and mix production runs.

prompt: Rephrase this text without altering its core message.

prompt: Rephrase this text without altering its core message.
input_text: I have 7 dogs.  All various breeds and sizes.  I was looking for a brand without additives that all my dogs would benefit from.  I have a few that need to lose weight.  Wellness makes the best product.  I buy the small bites for my little ones....pieces are small and they love it.  I but the Healthy weightCORE for my "dieters" and mix it with canned green beans or peas and carrots.  So far my Golden, who was an overweight rescue at 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds -- she's been on this food for about 7 months.  I buy the original CORE version for my baby bulldog, who had a lot of gas.  No more smells and ripples in the night!  Amazon has the best price for Wellness. And its shipped right to my home -- no lugging big bags back and forth.  Yes, it's more expensive than the other stuff--but it really works.  And that will cut down on future vet bills.  All my dogs are healthy and have nice shiny coats.  Priceless!  Wellness now has a SIMPLE version for those dogs who suffer with food allergies.  A family member has a little Teddy Bear with severe skin issues -- she'd scratch until raw and bloody.  She switched to the SIMPLE version of Wellness and has been itch free ever since.  Again...great brand!

prompt: Rework this text maintaining its original sentiment.
input_text:
My last purchase of 4 cases of this food had a sour off- smell. Called natural balance customer service, they said they hadn't received complaints about that batch, they'd pass info along to tech dept, they'd send me a coupon for 1 case.... But, it's a natural product, and variation "was to be expected". They suggested I return it to the retailer. Paying for shipping 3 times (receiving, sending back, receiving again) for a heavy product like this makes it very expensive.
I've fed this variety to my 3 cats for a year (alternate with Natural Balance Ultra), and they have always loved it. They will only eat this batch if they are very very hungry. I can barely stand to open the cans. All other batches had a clean fresh smell.
I'm disapointed with the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium priced product. (I have 3 cats). I won't buy from Natural Balance again. I'll use the coupon locally, and make sure I'm mixing production runs.
completion_text: my last purchase of 4 cases of this food had a sour off-smell. called natural balance customer service, they said they hadn't received complaints about that batch, they'd pass info along to tech dept, they'd send me a coupon for 1 case.... but, it's a natural product, and variation was to be expected. they suggested i return it to the retailer. paying for shipping 3 times (receiving, sending back, receiving again) for a heavy product like this makes it very expensive. i've fed this variety to my 3 cats for a year (alternate with natural balance ultra), and they have always loved it. they will only eat this batch if they are very very hungry. i can barely stand to open the cans. all other batches had a clean fresh smell. i'm disappointed with the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium priced product. (i have 3 cats). i won't buy from natural balance again. i'll use the coupon locally, and make sure i'm mixing production runs.

prompt: Rework this text maintaining its original sentiment.
input_text: I have 7 dogs.  All various breeds and sizes.  I was looking for a brand without additives that all my dogs would benefit from.  I have a few that need to lose weight.  Wellness makes the best product.  I buy the small bites for my little ones....pieces are small and they love it.  I but the Healthy weightCORE for my "dieters" and mix it with canned green beans or peas and carrots.  So far my Golden, who was an overweight rescue at 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds -- she's been on this food for about 7 months.  I buy the original CORE version for my baby bulldog, who had a lot of gas.  No more smells and ripples in the night!  Amazon has the best price for Wellness. And its shipped right to my home -- no lugging big bags back and forth.  Yes, it's more expensive than the other stuff--but it really works.  And that will cut down on future vet bills.  All my dogs are healthy and have nice shiny coats.  Priceless!  Wellness now has a SIMPLE version for those dogs who suffer with food allergies.  A family member has a little Teddy Bear with severe skin issues -- she'd scratch until raw and bloody.  She switched to the SIMPLE version of Wellness and has been itch free ever since.  Again...great brand!
completion_text: i have 7 dogs, various breeds and sizes. i was looking for a brand without additives that all my dogs would benefit from. i have a few that need to lose weight. wellness makes the best product. i buy the small bites for my little ones... pieces are small and they love it. i but the healthy weight core for my dieters and mix it with canned green beans or peas and carrots. so far my golden, who was an overweight rescue at 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds - she's been on this food for about 7 months. i buy the original core version for my baby bulldog, who had a lot of gas. no more smells and ripples in the night! amazon has the best price for wellness. and it's shipped right to my home - no lugging big bags back and forth. yes, it's more expensive than the other stuff - but it really works. and that will cut down on future vet bills. all my dogs are healthy and have nice shiny coats. priceless! wellness now has a simple version for those dogs who suffer with food allergies. a family member has a little teddy bear with severe skin issues - she'd scratch until raw and bloody. she switched to the simple version of wellness and has been itch-free ever since. again... great brand!

prompt: Rephrase this text without altering its core message.
input_text:
My last purchase of 4 cases of this food had a sour off- smell. Called natural balance customer service, they said they hadn't received complaints about that batch, they'd pass info along to tech dept, they'd send me a coupon for 1 case.... But, it's a natural product, and variation "was to be expected". They suggested I return it to the retailer. Paying for shipping 3 times (receiving, sending back, receiving again) for a heavy product like this makes it very expensive.
I've fed this variety to my 3 cats for a year (alternate with Natural Balance Ultra), and they have always loved it. They will only eat this batch if they are very very hungry. I can barely stand to open the cans. All other batches had a clean fresh smell.
I'm disapointed with the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium priced product. (I have 3 cats). I won't buy from Natural Balance again. I'll use the coupon locally, and make sure I'm mixing production runs.
completion_text: my last purchase of 4 cases had a sour off-smell. i called natural balance customer service, they said no one else had complained about that batch, but would pass info to tech dept and send me a coupon for 1 case. they suggested returning it to the retailer, paying shipping three times for a heavy product like this makes it very expensive. i've fed this variety to my 3 cats for a year (alternate with natural balance ultra), they loved all other batches, but this one has a sour smell. i'm disappointed with customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium priced product.

prompt: Rephrase this text without altering its core message.

Wellness makes the best product.  I buy the small bites for my little ones....pieces are small and they love it.  I but the Healthy weightCORE for my "dieters" and mix it with canned green beans or peas and carrots.  So far my Golden, who was an overweight rescue at 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds -- she's been on this food for about 7 months.  I buy the original CORE version for my baby bulldog, who had a lot of gas.  No more smells and ripples in the night!  Amazon has the best price for Wellness. And its shipped right to my home -- no lugging big bags back and forth.  Yes, it's more expensive than the other stuff--but it really works.  And that will cut down on future vet bills.  All my dogs are healthy and have nice shiny coats.  Priceless!  Wellness now has a SIMPLE version for those dogs who suffer with food allergies.  A family member has a little Teddy Bear with severe skin issues -- she'd scratch until raw and bloody.  She switched to the SIMPLE version of Wellness and has been itch free ever since.  Again...great brand!
completion_text: i have 7 dogs, all various breeds and sizes. i was looking for a brand without additives that my dogs would benefit from. my few overweight dogs need to lose weight. wellness makes the best product. i buy the small bites for my smaller dogs, they love it. i buy the healthy weightcore for my dieters, mixing it with canned green beans or peas and carrots. so far, my golden has lost 19 pounds - she's been on this food for about 7 months. i buy the original core version for my baby bulldog, who had gas. no more smells and ripples in the night! amazon has the best price for wellness and it ships right to my home - no lugging big bags back and forth. yes, it's more expensive than other stuff, but it really works. and that will cut down on future vet bills. all my dogs are healthy and have nice shiny coats. wellness now has a simple version for dogs with food allergies. a family member has a little teddy bear with severe skin issues - she'd scratch until raw and bloody. she switched to the simple version of wellness and has been itch-free ever since. again, great brand!

prompt: Transform this paragraph without altering its tone or meaning.
input_text: I have 7 dogs.  All various breeds and sizes.  I was looking for a brand without additives that all my dogs would benefit from.  I have a few that need to lose weight.  Wellness makes the best product.  I buy the small bites for my little ones....pieces are small and they love it.  I but the Healthy weightCORE for my "dieters" and mix it with canned green beans or peas and carrots.  So far my Golden, who was an overweight rescue at 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds -- she's been on this food for about 7 months.  I buy the original CORE version for my baby bulldog, who had a lot of gas.  No more smells and ripples in the night!  Amazon has the best price for Wellness. And its shipped right to my home -- no lugging big bags back and forth.  Yes, it's more expensive than the other stuff--but it really works.  And that will cut down on future vet bills.  All my dogs are healthy and have nice shiny coats.  Priceless!  Wellness now has a SIMPLE version for those dogs who suffer with food allergies.  A family member has a little Teddy Bear with severe skin issues -- she'd scratch until raw and bloody.  She switched to the SIMPLE version of Wellness and has been itch free ever since.  Again...great brand!
completion_text: i have seven dogs, various breeds and sizes. i was searching for a brand without additives that would benefit all my dogs. some need to lose weight. wellness makes the best product. i buy the small bites for my smaller ones...pieces are small and they love it. i buy the healthy weight core for my dieters and mix it with canned green beans or peas and carrots. so far, my golden, an overweight rescue at 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds   she's been on this food for about seven months. i buy the original core version for my baby bulldog, who had a lot of gas. no more smells and ripples in the night! amazon has the best price for wellness. it ships right to my home   no lugging big bags back and forth. yes, it's more expensive than other stuff   but it really works. and that will cut down on future vet bills. all my dogs are healthy and have nice shiny coats. priceless! wellness now has a simple version for dogs who suffer from food allergies. a family member has a little teddy bear with severe skin issues   she'd scratch until raw and bloody. she switched to the simple version of wellness and has been itch-free ever since. again...great brand!

prompt: Reword this statement while keeping the sentiment the same.
input_text:
My last purchase of 4 cases of this food had a sour off- smell. Called natural balance customer service, they said they hadn't received complaints about that batch, they'd pass info along to tech dept, they'd send me a coupon for 1 case.... But, it's a natural product, and variation "was to be expected". They suggested I return it to the retailer. Paying for shipping 3 times (receiving, sending back, receiving again) for a heavy product like this makes it very expensive.
I've fed this variety to my 3 cats for a year (alternate with Natural Balance Ultra), and they have always loved it. They will only eat this batch if they are very very hungry. I can barely stand to open the cans. All other batches had a clean fresh smell.
I'm disapointed with the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium priced product. (I have 3 cats). I won't buy from Natural Balance again. I'll use the coupon locally, and make sure I'm mixing production runs.
completion_text: my latest purchase of four cases of this food had an unpleasant sour smell. upon contacting natural balance customer service, they claimed no prior complaints about that batch, promised to pass along the information to their technical department, and offered a discount on one case. however, as it's a natural product, variation was expected. they suggested returning it to the retailer, which would involve paying for shipping three times, making it an expensive process for a heavy item like this.

prompt: Reword this statement while keeping the sentiment the same.
input_text:
I was expecting something more.

Blueberries - Very small pieces, and not many of them.

Clusters - Where did they go?! When you look at the pictures of this product, and other types of their granola, it would appear that you are getting a bag of large clusters. Not the case, there are almost no clusters. The biggest cluster I found in all 3 bags was the size of a dime.

Taste - Good, when you get some of everything.

With all the other products out there, I don't think I will be purchasing this one again.
completion_text: i was let down by my expectations.  the blueberries were tiny and scarce. the clusters disappeared; the pictures deceived me. the largest cluster i found was only a dime in size. it tasted good when everything mixed together. but with so many other options available, i won't be buying this again.

With all the other products out there, I don't think I will be purchasing this one again.

Again...great brand!

prompt: Rephrase this text without altering its core message.
input_text:
My last purchase of 4 cases of this food had a sour off- smell. Paying for shipping 3 times (receiving, sending back, receiving again) for a heavy product like this makes it very expensive.
I've fed this variety to my 3 cats for a year (alternate with Natural Balance Ultra), and they have always loved it. They will only eat this batch if they are very very hungry. I can barely stand to open the cans. All other batches had a clean fresh smell.
I'm disapointed with the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium priced product. (I have 3 cats). I won't buy from Natural Balance again. I'll use the coupon locally, and make sure I'm mixing production runs.

A family member has a little Teddy Bear with severe skin issues -- she'd scratch until raw and bloody.  She switched to the SIMPLE version of Wellness and has been itch free ever since.  Again...great brand!

I'm disapointed with the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium priced product. (I have 3 cats). I won't buy from Natural Balance again. I'll use the coupon locally, and make sure I'm mixing production runs.

With all the other products out there, I don't think I will be purchasing this one again.

prompt: Paraphrase this content while keeping its meaning unchanged.

So far my Golden, who was an overweight rescue at 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds -- she's been on this food for about 7 months.  I buy the original CORE version for my baby bulldog, who had a lot of gas.  No more smells and ripples in the night!  Amazon has the best price for Wellness. All my dogs are healthy and have nice shiny coats.  Priceless!  Wellness now has a SIMPLE version for those dogs who suffer with food allergies. Again...great brand!
completion_text: i have seven dogs, diverse in breed and size, and i was seeking a brand without additives that would benefit all of them. some need to lose weight, so wellness makes the best product for me. i buy their small bites for my smaller dogs, who love the tiny pieces. for my dieters, i mix healthy weight core with canned green beans or peas and carrots. my golden retriever, a rescue weighing 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds after being on this food for seven months. i also use the original core version for my baby bulldog, who had excessive gas; now there are no more odors or ripples at night. amazon offers the best price and delivers to my doorstep, avoiding heavy bag lugging. while wellness is pricier than other options, it truly works and will reduce future vet bills. all my dogs are healthy with shiny coats, priceless! additionally, wellness now has a simple version for dogs with food allergies, which has helped a family member's teddy bear with severe skin issues; she's been itch-free since switching.

Paying for shipping 3 times (receiving, sending back, receiving again) for a heavy product like this makes it very expensive.
I've fed this variety to my 3 cats for a year (alternate with Natural Balance Ultra), and they have always loved it. They will only eat this batch if they are very very hungry. I can barely stand to open the cans. All other batches had a clean fresh smell.
I'm disapointed with the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium priced product. (I have 3 cats). I won't buy from Natural Balance again. I'll use the coupon locally, and make sure I'm mixing production runs.

My last purchase of 4 cases of this food had a sour off- smell. Called natural balance customer service, they said they hadn't received complaints about that batch, they'd pass info along to tech dept, they'd send me a coupon for 1 case.... But, it's a natural product, and variation "was to be expected". They suggested I return it to the retailer. Paying for shipping 3 times (receiving, sending back, receiving again) for a heavy product like this makes it very expensive.
I've fed this variety to my 3 cats for a year (alternate with Natural Balance Ultra), and they have always loved it. They will only eat this batch if they are very very hungry. I can barely stand to open the cans. All other batches had a clean fresh smell.
I'm disapointed with the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium priced product. (I have 3 cats). I won't buy from Natural Balance again. I'll use the coupon locally, and make sure I'm mixing production runs.
completion_text: my recent purchase of four cases had a sour off-smell. when i contacted natural balance's customer service, they said they hadn't received complaints about that batch, but would pass the info along to their tech department and send me a coupon for one case. however, as it's a natural product, variation was expected, and they suggested returning it to the retailer. paying for shipping three times for a heavy product like this makes it very expensive. i've fed this variety to my three cats for a year (alternating with natural balance ultra), and they always loved it. they'll only eat this batch when extremely hungry. i can barely stand opening the cans. all other batches had a clean, fresh smell. i'm disappointed in the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium-priced product. i won't buy from natural balance again. i'll use the coupon locally and ensure mixing production runs.

prompt: Paraphrase this content while keeping its meaning unchanged.
input_text:
I bought this when i was hungry and on a whim.
there was this subscribe and save deal going on.

I like the nuts, i hate the carmel. Overall, it was too sweet for me. and now i have 6 boxes of it.
But it does work wonders when i'm hungry.
completion_text: i impulsively purchased this snack when i was famished on a whim, taking advantage of a subscribe and save promotion. while i enjoy the nuts, i despise the caramel. unfortunately, the overall product is too sweet for my taste. nevertheless, it has proven to be effective in satisfying my hunger, leaving me with six boxes of it.

prompt: Paraphrase this content while keeping its meaning unchanged.
input_text:
I was expecting something more.

Blueberries - Very small pieces, and not many of them.

Clusters - Where did they go?! When you look at the pictures of this product, and other types of their granola, it would appear that you are getting a bag of large clusters. Not the case, there are almost no clusters. The biggest cluster I found in all 3 bags was the size of a dime.

Taste - Good, when you get some of everything.

With all the other products out there, I don't think I will be purchasing this one again.
completion_text: i expected more from this product. the blueberries were small and scarce. clusters were nowhere to be found; pictures made it seem like i'd get a bag full of large ones, but they're almost non-existent, with the largest being about the size of a dime. the taste is good when you mix everything together. however, considering other options available, i don't think i'll buy this again.

prompt: Paraphrase this content while keeping its meaning unchanged.
input_text: I have 7 dogs.  All various breeds and sizes.  I was looking for a brand without additives that all my dogs would benefit from.  I have a few that need to lose weight.  Wellness makes the best product.  I buy the small bites for my little ones....pieces are small and they love it.  I but the Healthy weightCORE for my "dieters" and mix it with canned green beans or peas and carrots.  So far my Golden, who was an overweight rescue at 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds -- she's been on this food for about 7 months.  I buy the original CORE version for my baby bulldog, who had a lot of gas.  No more smells and ripples in the night!  Amazon has the best price for Wellness. And its shipped right to my home -- no lugging big bags back and forth.  Yes, it's more expensive than the other stuff--but it really works.  And that will cut down on future vet bills.  All my dogs are healthy and have nice shiny coats.  Priceless!  Wellness now has a SIMPLE version for those dogs who suffer with food allergies.  A family member has a little Teddy Bear with severe skin issues -- she'd scratch until raw and bloody.  She switched to the SIMPLE version of Wellness and has been itch free ever since.  Again...great brand!
completion_text: i have seven dogs, each with its own breed and size. i was searching for a brand without additives that would benefit all my dogs equally. some need to lose weight, so i use wellness's best product. for my smaller dogs, i buy the small bites; they love it. for my dieters, i mix the healthy weight core with canned green beans or peas and carrots. so far, my golden has lost 19 pounds since switching to this food about seven months ago. i also use the original core version for my baby bulldog, who had gas issues. since switching, there are no more smelly ripples at night! amazon offers the best price on wellness, with convenient shipping right to my door. while it's pricier than other options, it really works and will reduce future vet bills. all my dogs are healthy and have nice coats. the simple version of wellness is great for dogs with food allergies; a family member's teddy bear with severe skin issues has been itch-free since switching.

completion_text: i'm extremely satisfied with this product. its flavor pairs perfectly with coffee, making for a swift morning meal. following the banana walnut's introduction, i discovered the chocolate chip variant and placed an order. undoubtedly, the chocolate chip has become my top choice.

prompt: Rewrite this sentence ensuring the sentiment remains unchanged.
input_text:
My last purchase of 4 cases of this food had a sour off- smell. Called natural balance customer service, they said they hadn't received complaints about that batch, they'd pass info along to tech dept, they'd send me a coupon for 1 case.... But, it's a natural product, and variation "was to be expected". They suggested I return it to the retailer. Paying for shipping 3 times (receiving, sending back, receiving again) for a heavy product like this makes it very expensive.
I've fed this variety to my 3 cats for a year (alternate with Natural Balance Ultra), and they have always loved it. They will only eat this batch if they are very very hungry. I can barely stand to open the cans. All other batches had a clean fresh smell.
I'm disapointed with the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium priced product. (I have 3 cats). I won't buy from Natural Balance again. I'll use the coupon locally, and make sure I'm mixing production runs.
completion_text: my last purchase of four cases had a sour off-smell. i called natural balance customer service; they said they hadn't received complaints about that batch, would pass info along to tech dept, and send me a coupon for one case. however, it's a natural product, and variation was to be expected. they suggested returning it to the retailer, which would involve paying for shipping three times, making it very expensive.

prompt: Rewrite this sentence ensuring the sentiment remains unchanged.
input_text:
I was expecting something more.

Blueberries - Very small pieces, and not many of them.

Clusters - Where did they go?! When you look at the pictures of this product, and other types of their granola, it would appear that you are getting a bag of large clusters. Not the case, there are almost no clusters. The biggest cluster I found in all 3 bags was the size of a dime.

Taste - Good, when you get some of everything.

With all the other products out there, I don't think I will be purchasing this one again.

prompt: Rewrite this sentence ensuring the sentiment remains unchanged.
input_text: I have 7 dogs.  All various breeds and sizes.  I was looking for a brand without additives that all my dogs would benefit from.  I have a few that need to lose weight.  Wellness makes the best product.  I buy the small bites for my little ones....pieces are small and they love it.  I but the Healthy weightCORE for my "dieters" and mix it with canned green beans or peas and carrots.  So far my Golden, who was an overweight rescue at 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds -- she's been on this food for about 7 months.  I buy the original CORE version for my baby bulldog, who had a lot of gas.  No more smells and ripples in the night!  Amazon has the best price for Wellness. And its shipped right to my home -- no lugging big bags back and forth.  Yes, it's more expensive than the other stuff--but it really works.  And that will cut down on future vet bills.  All my dogs are healthy and have nice shiny coats.  Priceless!  Wellness now has a SIMPLE version for those dogs who suffer with food allergies.  A family member has a little Teddy Bear with severe skin issues -- she'd scratch until raw and bloody.  She switched to the SIMPLE version of Wellness and has been itch free ever since.  Again...great brand!
completion_text: i have seven dogs, various breeds and sizes. i was looking for a brand without additives that all my dogs would benefit from. some need to lose weight. wellness makes the best product. i buy the small bites for my smaller ones, pieces are small and they love it. i also get the healthy weight core for my dieters and mix it with canned green beans or peas and carrots. so far, my golden has lost 19 pounds - she's been on this food for about seven months. i buy the original core version for my baby bulldog who had a lot of gas. no more smells and ripples at night! amazon has the best price for wellness and ships right to my home - no lugging big bags back and forth. yes, it's more expensive than other stuff, but it really works and will cut down on future vet bills. all my dogs are healthy with nice shiny coats. priceless! wellness now has a simple version for dogs who suffer from food allergies. a family member has a little teddy bear with severe skin issues - she'd scratch until raw and bloody. she switched to the simple version of wellness and has been itch-free ever since. again, great brand!

input_text: I have 7 dogs.  All various breeds and sizes.  I was looking for a brand without additives that all my dogs would benefit from.  I have a few that need to lose weight. Again...great brand!
completion_text: i have seven dogs, all different breeds and sizes, and i've been searching for a pet food without additives that would benefit them all. some of my dogs need to lose weight, so i found wellness makes the best product. i buy the small bites for my smaller dogs, which they love because the pieces are small. for my dieters, i mix healthy weight core with canned green beans or peas and carrots. one of my golden retrievers, who was an overweight rescue at 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds in about seven months on this food. i also buy the original core version for my baby bulldog, who had digestive issues, and now there are no more smelly nights! amazon offers the best price for wellness and ships it directly to my home, so i don't have to lug big bags around. while it's more expensive than other brands, it really works and will save on future vet bills. all my dogs are healthy with nice coats, which is priceless. additionally, wellness now has a simple version for dogs with food allergies. a family member's teddy bear with severe skin issues was itch-free after switching to this new formula. again, wellness is an excellent brand!

prompt: Simplify this passage retaining the original sentiment.
input_text:
My last purchase of 4 cases of this food had a sour off- smell. I'm disapointed with the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium priced product. (I have 3 cats). I won't buy from Natural Balance again. I'll use the coupon locally, and make sure I'm mixing production runs.

prompt: Rewrite this paragraph while keeping the same tone and meaning.
input_text: I have 7 dogs.  All various breeds and sizes.  I was looking for a brand without additives that all my dogs would benefit from.  I have a few that need to lose weight.  Wellness makes the best product.  I buy the small bites for my little ones....pieces are small and they love it. So far my Golden, who was an overweight rescue at 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds -- she's been on this food for about 7 months.  I buy the original CORE version for my baby bulldog, who had a lot of gas.  No more smells and ripples in the night!  Amazon has the best price for Wellness. And its shipped right to my home -- no lugging big bags back and forth.  Yes, it's more expensive than the other stuff--but it really works.  And that will cut down on future vet bills.  All my dogs are healthy and have nice shiny coats.  Priceless!  Wellness now has a SIMPLE version for those dogs who suffer with food allergies.  A family member has a little Teddy Bear with severe skin issues -- she'd scratch until raw and bloody.  She switched to the SIMPLE version of Wellness and has been itch free ever since.  Again...great brand!
completion_text: i have seven dogs, varying breeds and sizes, and i was searching for a brand without additives that all my dogs could benefit from. a few of them need to lose weight, which is why i've found wellness to be the best product. for my smaller ones, i buy the small bites they love, while for my dieters, i mix the healthy weight core with canned green beans or peas and carrots. my golden retriever, who was an overweight rescue at 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds after being on this food for about seven months. for my baby bulldog, i use the original core version to alleviate gas issues, which are no longer a problem. amazon offers the best price for wellness, with convenient shipping right to my doorstep. although it's more expensive than other options, it works and will reduce future vet bills. my dogs are all healthy and have nice shiny coats - priceless! additionally, wellness now has a simple version for dogs with food allergies. a family member's teddy bear, who suffered from severe skin issues, has been itch-free since switching to the simple version of wellness. i highly recommend this great brand.

prompt: Simplify this passage retaining the original sentiment.
input_text:

I'm disapointed with the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium priced product. (I have 3 cats). I won't buy from Natural Balance again. I'll use the coupon locally, and make sure I'm mixing production runs.

Paying for shipping 3 times (receiving, sending back, receiving again) for a heavy product like this makes it very expensive.
I've fed this variety to my 3 cats for a year (alternate with Natural Balance Ultra), and they have always loved it. They will only eat this batch if they are very very hungry. I can barely stand to open the cans. All other batches had a clean fresh smell.
I'm disapointed with the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium priced product. (I have 3 cats). I won't buy from Natural Balance again. I'll use the coupon locally, and make sure I'm mixing production runs.
completion_text: my last purchase of four cases had a sour off-smell. natural balance customer service said they hadn't received complaints about that batch, would pass info to tech dept, and send a coupon for one case... but it's a natural product, and variation is expected. they suggested i return it to the retailer, paying for shipping three times for a heavy product like this makes it very expensive.

prompt: Rephrase this content while preserving its original intent.
input_text:
My last purchase of 4 cases of this food had a sour off- smell. Called natural balance customer service, they said they hadn't received complaints about that batch, they'd pass info along to tech dept, they'd send me a coupon for 1 case.... But, it's a natural product, and variation "was to be expected". They suggested I return it to the retailer. Paying for shipping 3 times (receiving, sending back, receiving again) for a heavy product like this makes it very expensive.
I've fed this variety to my 3 cats for a year (alternate with Natural Balance Ultra), and they have always loved it. They will only eat this batch if they are very very hungry. I can barely stand to open the cans. All other batches had a clean fresh smell.
I'm disapointed with the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium priced product. (I have 3 cats). I won't buy from Natural Balance again. I'll use the coupon locally, and make sure I'm mixing production runs.
completion_text: my last purchase of 4 cases of this food had a sour off-smell. i called natural balance customer service and they said they hadn't received complaints about that batch, would pass info along to tech dept, and send me a coupon for 1 case. they suggested i return it to the retailer, paying for shipping three times makes it very expensive. i've fed this variety to my 3 cats for a year (alternate with natural balance ultra), and they always loved it. they will only eat this batch if they're very hungry. i barely stand to open the cans. all other batches had a clean fresh smell. i'm disappointed with the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium priced product. i won't buy from natural balance again.

prompt: Rephrase this content while preserving its original intent.
input_text:

Blueberries - Very small pieces, and not many of them.

Taste - Good, when you get some of everything.

With all the other products out there, I don't think I will be purchasing this one again.

prompt: Rephrase this content while preserving its original intent.
input_text: I have 7 dogs.  All various breeds and sizes.  I was looking for a brand without additives that all my dogs would benefit from.  I have a few that need to lose weight.  Wellness makes the best product.  I buy the small bites for my little ones....pieces are small and they love it.  I but the Healthy weightCORE for my "dieters" and mix it with canned green beans or peas and carrots.  So far my Golden, who was an overweight rescue at 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds -- she's been on this food for about 7 months.  I buy the original CORE version for my baby bulldog, who had a lot of gas.  No more smells and ripples in the night!  Amazon has the best price for Wellness. And its shipped right to my home -- no lugging big bags back and forth.  Yes, it's more expensive than the other stuff--but it really works.  And that will cut down on future vet bills.  All my dogs are healthy and have nice shiny coats.  Priceless!  Wellness now has a SIMPLE version for those dogs who suffer with food allergies.  A family member has a little Teddy Bear with severe skin issues -- she'd scratch until raw and bloody.  She switched to the SIMPLE version of Wellness and has been itch free ever since.  Again...great brand!
completion_text: i have 7 dogs, various breeds and sizes. i was looking for a brand without additives that would benefit all my dogs. some need to lose weight. wellness makes the best product. i buy the small bites for my little ones, as the pieces are small and they love it. i buy the healthy weight core for my dieters and mix it with canned green beans or peas and carrots. my golden, an overweight rescue at 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds after being on this food for about 7 months. i buy the original core version for my baby bulldog, who had a lot of gas. no more smells and ripples in the night! amazon has the best price for wellness, and it ships right to my home - no lugging big bags back and forth. it's more expensive than other stuff, but it really works and will cut down on future vet bills. all my dogs are healthy and have nice shiny coats. priceless! wellness now has a simple version for dogs who suffer from food allergies. a family member has a little teddy bear with severe skin issues - she'd scratch until raw and bloody. she switched to the simple version of wellness and has been itch-free ever since. again, great brand!

prompt: Rewrite this paragraph while keeping the same tone and meaning.

prompt: Rewrite this paragraph while keeping the same tone and meaning.
input_text: I have 7 dogs.  All various breeds and sizes.  I was looking for a brand without additives that all my dogs would benefit from.  I have a few that need to lose weight.  Wellness makes the best product.  I buy the small bites for my little ones....pieces are small and they love it.  I but the Healthy weightCORE for my "dieters" and mix it with canned green beans or peas and carrots.  So far my Golden, who was an overweight rescue at 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds -- she's been on this food for about 7 months.  I buy the original CORE version for my baby bulldog, who had a lot of gas.  No more smells and ripples in the night!  Amazon has the best price for Wellness. And its shipped right to my home -- no lugging big bags back and forth.  Yes, it's more expensive than the other stuff--but it really works.  And that will cut down on future vet bills.  All my dogs are healthy and have nice shiny coats.  Priceless!  Wellness now has a SIMPLE version for those dogs who suffer with food allergies.  A family member has a little Teddy Bear with severe skin issues -- she'd scratch until raw and bloody.  She switched to the SIMPLE version of Wellness and has been itch free ever since.  Again...great brand!
completion_text: i have seven dogs, each with unique breeds and sizes. i sought a brand without additives that would benefit all my dogs, including those needing weight loss. wellness makes the best product. for my smaller dogs, i buy the small bites they love, while for dieters, i mix healthy weight core with canned vegetables. my golden retriever, once an overweight rescue at 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds in seven months. i also use original core for my baby bulldog, which eliminated gas issues. amazon offers the best price and convenient shipping. while wellness is more expensive than others, it's effective and will reduce future vet bills. all my dogs are healthy with shiny coats   priceless! wellness now has a simple version for dogs with food allergies, which helped a family member's teddy bear with severe skin issues, becoming itch-free since the switch. great brand!

prompt: Rewrite this paragraph while keeping the same tone and meaning.
input_text:
My last purchase of 4 cases of this food had a sour off- smell. Called natural balance customer service, they said they hadn't received complaints about that batch, they'd pass info along to tech dept, they'd send me a coupon for 1 case.... But, it's a natural product, and variation "was to be expected". They suggested I return it to the retailer. Paying for shipping 3 times (receiving, sending back, receiving again) for a heavy product like this makes it very expensive.
I've fed this variety to my 3 cats for a year (alternate with Natural Balance Ultra), and they have always loved it. They will only eat this batch if they are very very hungry. I can barely stand to open the cans. All other batches had a clean fresh smell.
I'm disapointed with the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium priced product. (I have 3 cats). I won't buy from Natural Balance again. I'll use the coupon locally, and make sure I'm mixing production runs.
completion_text: my latest purchase of four cases of this food had an unpleasant sour smell. when i contacted natural balance's customer service, they told me they hadn't received complaints about that batch, would pass along the info to their tech department, and send a coupon for one case. however, as it's a natural product, variation was expected. they suggested i return it to the retailer, but paying for shipping three times for such a heavy product makes it extremely costly. i've been feeding this variety to my three cats for a year (alternating with natural balance ultra), and they always loved it. this batch is the only one they'll eat when they're very hungry, and i can barely stand opening the cans. all other batches had a clean, fresh smell. i'm disappointed in the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium-priced product (i have three cats). i won't be buying from natural balance again. i'll use the coupon locally and ensure i mix production runs.

Called natural balance customer service, they said they hadn't received complaints about that batch, they'd pass info along to tech dept, they'd send me a coupon for 1 case.... But, it's a natural product, and variation "was to be expected". They suggested I return it to the retailer. Paying for shipping 3 times (receiving, sending back, receiving again) for a heavy product like this makes it very expensive.
I've fed this variety to my 3 cats for a year (alternate with Natural Balance Ultra), and they have always loved it. They will only eat this batch if they are very very hungry. I can barely stand to open the cans. All other batches had a clean fresh smell.
I'm disapointed with the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium priced product. (I have 3 cats). I won't buy from Natural Balance again. I'll use the coupon locally, and make sure I'm mixing production runs.

(i have 3 cats). i won't buy from natural balance again. i'll use the coupon locally, and make sure i'm mixing production runs.

Again...great brand!
