prompt: Reword this statement while keeping the sentiment the same.
input_text:
My last purchase of 4 cases of this food had a sour off- smell. Called natural balance customer service, they said they hadn't received complaints about that batch, they'd pass info along to tech dept, they'd send me a coupon for 1 case.... But, it's a natural product, and variation "was to be expected". They suggested I return it to the retailer. Paying for shipping 3 times (receiving, sending back, receiving again) for a heavy product like this makes it very expensive.
I've fed this variety to my 3 cats for a year (alternate with Natural Balance Ultra), and they have always loved it. They will only eat this batch if they are very very hungry. I can barely stand to open the cans. All other batches had a clean fresh smell.
I'm disapointed with the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium priced product. (I have 3 cats). I won't buy from Natural Balance again. I'll use the coupon locally, and make sure I'm mixing production runs.
completion_text: my latest purchase of four cases of this pet food had an unpleasantly sour smell. when i contacted natural balance's customer service, they claimed not to have received similar complaints about that specific batch, but offered a coupon for one case and suggested returning it to the retailer, which would require me to pay for shipping three times - a costly burden for such a heavy product. as a loyal customer who has fed my cats this variety for over a year (alternating with natural balance ultra), i'm disappointed in their response to a quality issue from a dedicated user of their premium-priced product.

there was this subscribe and save deal going on.

prompt: Reword this statement while keeping the sentiment the same.
input_text:
I was expecting something more.

Blueberries - Very small pieces, and not many of them.

Clusters - Where did they go?! When you look at the pictures of this product, and other types of their granola, it would appear that you are getting a bag of large clusters. Not the case, there are almost no clusters. The biggest cluster I found in all 3 bags was the size of a dime.

Taste - Good, when you get some of everything.

With all the other products out there, I don't think I will be purchasing this one again.
completion_text: i had high hopes, but unfortunately, this product fell short. the blueberries were tiny and scarce, while the clusters that seemed so abundant in pictures were nowhere to be found - i only managed to find a few small ones, the largest being about the size of a dime. while the taste was good when i got a mix of ingredients, overall, i'm not impressed and won't be repurchasing this product.

prompt: Reword this statement while keeping the sentiment the same.
input_text: I have 7 dogs.  All various breeds and sizes.  I was looking for a brand without additives that all my dogs would benefit from.  I have a few that need to lose weight.  Wellness makes the best product.  I buy the small bites for my little ones....pieces are small and they love it.  I but the Healthy weightCORE for my "dieters" and mix it with canned green beans or peas and carrots.  So far my Golden, who was an overweight rescue at 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds -- she's been on this food for about 7 months.  I buy the original CORE version for my baby bulldog, who had a lot of gas.  No more smells and ripples in the night!  Amazon has the best price for Wellness. And its shipped right to my home -- no lugging big bags back and forth.  Yes, it's more expensive than the other stuff--but it really works.  And that will cut down on future vet bills.  All my dogs are healthy and have nice shiny coats.  Priceless!  Wellness now has a SIMPLE version for those dogs who suffer with food allergies.  A family member has a little Teddy Bear with severe skin issues -- she'd scratch until raw and bloody.  She switched to the SIMPLE version of Wellness and has been itch free ever since.  Again...great brand!
completion_text: i have a diverse pack of seven dogs, each with unique characteristics. i sought a reputable brand without additives that would benefit all my canine companions. some of them require weight loss, so i rely on wellness's effective products. for smaller breeds, i opt for the small bites they adore. for dieting dogs, i mix healthy weight core with vegetables like green beans or peas and carrots. one overweight golden retriever has lost 19 pounds in seven months after transitioning to this food. my baby bulldog, who suffered from gas, now enjoys a comfortable night's sleep thanks to the original core version. amazon offers the best price for wellness, which is shipped directly to my doorstep, eliminating the need for heavy bags and saving me time. although it's pricier than other options, wellness truly delivers, reducing potential vet bills in the long run. my dogs now enjoy good health, shiny coats, and priceless well-being, thanks to wellness.

Blueberries - Very small pieces, and not many of them.

Clusters - Where did they go?! When you look at the pictures of this product, and other types of their granola, it would appear that you are getting a bag of large clusters. Not the case, there are almost no clusters. The biggest cluster I found in all 3 bags was the size of a dime.

Taste - Good, when you get some of everything.

With all the other products out there, I don't think I will be purchasing this one again.

Again...great brand!

prompt: Rephrase this text without altering its core message.
input_text:
My last purchase of 4 cases of this food had a sour off- smell. Paying for shipping 3 times (receiving, sending back, receiving again) for a heavy product like this makes it very expensive.
I've fed this variety to my 3 cats for a year (alternate with Natural Balance Ultra), and they have always loved it. They will only eat this batch if they are very very hungry. I can barely stand to open the cans. All other batches had a clean fresh smell.
I'm disapointed with the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium priced product. (I have 3 cats). I won't buy from Natural Balance again. I'll use the coupon locally, and make sure I'm mixing production runs.

prompt: Paraphrase this passage without changing its meaning.
input_text:
My last purchase of 4 cases of this food had a sour off- smell. But, it's a natural product, and variation "was to be expected". They suggested I return it to the retailer. Paying for shipping 3 times (receiving, sending back, receiving again) for a heavy product like this makes it very expensive.
I've fed this variety to my 3 cats for a year (alternate with Natural Balance Ultra), and they have always loved it. They will only eat this batch if they are very very hungry. I can barely stand to open the cans. All other batches had a clean fresh smell.
I'm disapointed with the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium priced product. (I have 3 cats). I won't buy from Natural Balance again. I'll use the coupon locally, and make sure I'm mixing production runs.
completion_text: my latest purchase of four cases of this food had an unpleasant sour smell. when i contacted natural balance customer service, they claimed to have received no complaints about that specific batch, but offered to pass on the information to their technical department and sent a coupon for one case. however, as a natural product, variation was expected. they suggested returning it to the retailer, incurring three shipping costs for a heavy item like this. i've fed my three cats this variety for a year, alternating with natural balance ultra, and they always loved it. but this batch is unpalatable even when they're extremely hungry. the smell is unbearable. all previous batches had a clean, fresh scent. i'm dissatisfied with the customer service response to a quality issue from a loyal customer of their premium-priced product. as a result, i won't be buying from natural balance again and will use the coupon locally while ensuring i mix production runs.

Again...great brand!
completion_text: i have seven dogs, all different breeds and sizes. i was looking for a brand without additives that would benefit all my dogs. some need to lose weight, so wellness makes the best product. i buy the small bites for my smaller dogs, which they love, and the healthy weight core formula mixed with canned vegetables for my dieters. my golden retriever, who was an overweight rescue at 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds after being on this food for about seven months. i also use the original core version for my baby bulldog, who had gas issues, and it's eliminated the smells and ripples at night. amazon offers the best price for wellness and ships directly to my home, which is convenient. although it's more expensive than other options, it really works and will reduce future vet bills. all my dogs are healthy with nice coats. additionally, wellness now has a simple version for dogs with food allergies, which has helped a family member's teddy bear with severe skin issues that would cause scratching until raw and bloody. she's been itch-free since switching to the simple version of wellness.

prompt: Revise this text ensuring the sentiment stays consistent.
input_text:
My last purchase of 4 cases of this food had a sour off- smell. Called natural balance customer service, they said they hadn't received complaints about that batch, they'd pass info along to tech dept, they'd send me a coupon for 1 case.... But, it's a natural product, and variation "was to be expected". They suggested I return it to the retailer. Paying for shipping 3 times (receiving, sending back, receiving again) for a heavy product like this makes it very expensive.
I've fed this variety to my 3 cats for a year (alternate with Natural Balance Ultra), and they have always loved it. They will only eat this batch if they are very very hungry. I can barely stand to open the cans. All other batches had a clean fresh smell.
I'm disapointed with the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium priced product. (I have 3 cats). I won't buy from Natural Balance again. I'll use the coupon locally, and make sure I'm mixing production runs.
completion_text: my last purchase of 4 cases of this food had a sour off-smell. i called natural balance customer service, they said they hadn't received complaints about that batch, they'd pass info along to tech dept, they'd send me a coupon for 1 case.... but, it's a natural product, and variation was to be expected. they suggested i return it to the retailer. paying for shipping three times (receiving, sending back, receiving again) for a heavy product like this makes it very expensive. i've fed this variety to my 3 cats for a year (alternate with natural balance ultra), and they have always loved it. they will only eat this batch if they are very very hungry. i can barely stand to open the cans. all other batches had a clean fresh smell. i'm disappointed with the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium-priced product (i have 3 cats). i won't buy from natural balance again. i'll use the coupon locally, and make sure i'm mixing production runs.

prompt: Revise this text ensuring the sentiment stays consistent.
input_text:
I was expecting something more.

Blueberries - Very small pieces, and not many of them.

Clusters - Where did they go?! When you look at the pictures of this product, and other types of their granola, it would appear that you are getting a bag of large clusters. Not the case, there are almost no clusters. The biggest cluster I found in all 3 bags was the size of a dime.

Taste - Good, when you get some of everything.

With all the other products out there, I don't think I will be purchasing this one again.
completion_text: i was expecting something more. blueberries - very small pieces, and not many of them. clusters - where did they go?! when you look at the pictures of this product, it would appear that you're getting a bag of large clusters. not the case; there are almost no clusters. the biggest cluster i found in all three bags was the size of a dime. taste - good, when you get some of everything. with all the other products out there, i don't think i will be purchasing this one again.

prompt: Revise this text ensuring the sentiment stays consistent.
input_text: I have 7 dogs.  All various breeds and sizes.  I was looking for a brand without additives that all my dogs would benefit from.  I have a few that need to lose weight.  Wellness makes the best product.  I buy the small bites for my little ones....pieces are small and they love it.  I but the Healthy weightCORE for my "dieters" and mix it with canned green beans or peas and carrots.  So far my Golden, who was an overweight rescue at 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds -- she's been on this food for about 7 months.  I buy the original CORE version for my baby bulldog, who had a lot of gas.  No more smells and ripples in the night!  Amazon has the best price for Wellness. And its shipped right to my home -- no lugging big bags back and forth.  Yes, it's more expensive than the other stuff--but it really works.  And that will cut down on future vet bills.  All my dogs are healthy and have nice shiny coats.  Priceless!  Wellness now has a SIMPLE version for those dogs who suffer with food allergies.  A family member has a little Teddy Bear with severe skin issues -- she'd scratch until raw and bloody.  She switched to the SIMPLE version of Wellness and has been itch free ever since.  Again...great brand!
completion_text: i have 7 dogs, all various breeds and sizes. i was looking for a brand without additives that all my dogs would benefit from. i have a few that need to lose weight. wellness makes the best product. i buy the small bites for my little ones, pieces are small and they love it. i but the healthy weight core for my dieters and mix it with canned green beans or peas and carrots. so far, my golden, who was an overweight rescue at 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds - she's been on this food for about 7 months. i buy the original core version for my baby bulldog, who had a lot of gas. no more smells and ripples in the night! amazon has the best price for wellness, and it shipped right to my home - no lugging big bags back and forth. yes, it's more expensive than the other stuff - but it really works. and that will cut down on future vet bills. all my dogs are healthy and have nice shiny coats. priceless! wellness now has a simple version for those dogs who suffer with food allergies. a family member has a little teddy bear with severe skin issues - she'd scratch until raw and bloody. she switched to the simple version of wellness and has been itch-free ever since. again... great brand!

input_text:

I'm disapointed with the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium priced product. (I have 3 cats). I won't buy from Natural Balance again. I'll use the coupon locally, and make sure I'm mixing production runs.

input_text: I have 7 dogs.  All various breeds and sizes.  I was looking for a brand without additives that all my dogs would benefit from.  I have a few that need to lose weight.  Wellness makes the best product.  I buy the small bites for my little ones....pieces are small and they love it. So far my Golden, who was an overweight rescue at 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds -- she's been on this food for about 7 months. All my dogs are healthy and have nice shiny coats.  Priceless!  Wellness now has a SIMPLE version for those dogs who suffer with food allergies.  A family member has a little Teddy Bear with severe skin issues -- she'd scratch until raw and bloody.  She switched to the SIMPLE version of Wellness and has been itch free ever since.  Again...great brand!
completion_text: i have seven dogs, various breeds and sizes, and i was looking for an additive-free food that would benefit all of them. some need to lose weight, so i use wellness's healthy weight core formula mixed with canned green beans or peas and carrots. one of my golden retrievers, a rescue who weighed 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds after being on this food for seven months. for my baby bulldog, who suffered from gas, the original core version has eliminated night-time odors and ripples. i buy wellness from amazon, which offers the best price with home delivery. while it's more expensive than other brands, it works and will reduce future vet bills. all my dogs are healthy and have shiny coats, making it priceless. wellness also offers a simple version for dogs with food allergies; a family member's teddy bear with severe skin issues has been itch-free since switching to this formula.

Wellness makes the best product.  I buy the small bites for my little ones....pieces are small and they love it.  I but the Healthy weightCORE for my "dieters" and mix it with canned green beans or peas and carrots.  So far my Golden, who was an overweight rescue at 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds -- she's been on this food for about 7 months.  I buy the original CORE version for my baby bulldog, who had a lot of gas.  No more smells and ripples in the night!  Amazon has the best price for Wellness. And its shipped right to my home -- no lugging big bags back and forth.  Yes, it's more expensive than the other stuff--but it really works.  And that will cut down on future vet bills.  All my dogs are healthy and have nice shiny coats.  Priceless!  Wellness now has a SIMPLE version for those dogs who suffer with food allergies.  A family member has a little Teddy Bear with severe skin issues -- she'd scratch until raw and bloody.  She switched to the SIMPLE version of Wellness and has been itch free ever since.  Again...great brand!
completion_text: i have 7 dogs, all various breeds and sizes. i was looking for a brand without additives that all my dogs would benefit from. i have a few that need to lose weight. wellness makes the best product. i buy the small bites for my little ones, pieces are small and they love it. i buy the healthy weightcore for my dieters and mix it with canned green beans or peas and carrots. so far my golden, who was an overweight rescue at 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds   she's been on this food for about 7 months. i buy the original core version for my baby bulldog, who had a lot of gas. no more smells and ripples in the night! amazon has the best price for wellness and it's shipped right to my home   no lugging big bags back and forth. yes, it's more expensive than the other stuff   but it really works. and that will cut down on future vet bills. all my dogs are healthy and have nice shiny coats. priceless! wellness now has a simple version for those dogs who suffer with food allergies. a family member has a little teddy bear with severe skin issues   she'd scratch until raw and bloody. she switched to the simple version of wellness and has been itch-free ever since. again... great brand!

prompt: Paraphrase this passage without changing its meaning.
input_text:
My last purchase of 4 cases of this food had a sour off- smell. Called natural balance customer service, they said they hadn't received complaints about that batch, they'd pass info along to tech dept, they'd send me a coupon for 1 case.... But, it's a natural product, and variation "was to be expected". They suggested I return it to the retailer. Paying for shipping 3 times (receiving, sending back, receiving again) for a heavy product like this makes it very expensive.
I've fed this variety to my 3 cats for a year (alternate with Natural Balance Ultra), and they have always loved it. They will only eat this batch if they are very very hungry. I can barely stand to open the cans. All other batches had a clean fresh smell.
I'm disapointed with the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium priced product. (I have 3 cats). I won't buy from Natural Balance again. I'll use the coupon locally, and make sure I'm mixing production runs.
completion_text: my recent purchase of four cases had a sour off-odor. when i contacted natural balance's customer service, they said no one else has complained about this batch, but they'd pass on the information to their tech department and send me a coupon for one case. however, as it's a natural product, variation is expected. they suggested returning it to the retailer, which would involve paying for shipping three times - a costly expense for a heavy product like this. i've fed this variety to my three cats for a year, alternating with natural balance ultra, and they always loved it. but this batch has a strong unpleasant smell that even my cats won't eat unless they're extremely hungry. all previous batches had a clean fresh smell. i'm disappointed in the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium-priced product.

prompt: Paraphrase this passage without changing its meaning.
input_text:
I was expecting something more.

Blueberries - Very small pieces, and not many of them.

Clusters - Where did they go?! When you look at the pictures of this product, and other types of their granola, it would appear that you are getting a bag of large clusters. Not the case, there are almost no clusters. The biggest cluster I found in all 3 bags was the size of a dime.

Taste - Good, when you get some of everything.

With all the other products out there, I don't think I will be purchasing this one again.

With all the other products out there, I don't think I will be purchasing this one again.

All my dogs are healthy and have nice shiny coats.  Priceless!  Wellness now has a SIMPLE version for those dogs who suffer with food allergies.  A family member has a little Teddy Bear with severe skin issues -- she'd scratch until raw and bloody.  She switched to the SIMPLE version of Wellness and has been itch free ever since.  Again...great brand!
completion_text: i have seven dogs, ranging in breed and size. i was searching for a wholesome food without additives that would benefit all my dogs. a few need to shed pounds, so wellness makes the best product for me. i buy their small bites for my smaller pups - they adore the tiny pieces! for my dieters, i mix healthy weight core with canned green beans or peas and carrots. my golden retriever, once an overweight rescue at 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds after being on this food for seven months. i also use original core for my baby bulldog, who had severe gas issues. no more odors or ripples at night! amazon offers the best price for wellness and ships directly to my doorstep - no heavy bags for me! yes, it's pricier than other brands, but it really works and will save on future vet bills in the long run. all my dogs are healthy with shiny coats, which is priceless. additionally, wellness now has a simple version for dogs with food allergies, which has been a game-changer for a family member's teddy bear with severe skin issues - she's remained itch-free since making the switch. another great brand!

prompt: Simplify this passage retaining the original sentiment.
input_text:
My last purchase of 4 cases of this food had a sour off- smell. I'm disapointed with the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium priced product. (I have 3 cats). I won't buy from Natural Balance again. I'll use the coupon locally, and make sure I'm mixing production runs.

Called natural balance customer service, they said they hadn't received complaints about that batch, they'd pass info along to tech dept, they'd send me a coupon for 1 case.... But, it's a natural product, and variation "was to be expected". They suggested I return it to the retailer. Paying for shipping 3 times (receiving, sending back, receiving again) for a heavy product like this makes it very expensive.
I've fed this variety to my 3 cats for a year (alternate with Natural Balance Ultra), and they have always loved it. They will only eat this batch if they are very very hungry. I can barely stand to open the cans. All other batches had a clean fresh smell.
I'm disapointed with the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium priced product. (I have 3 cats). I won't buy from Natural Balance again. I'll use the coupon locally, and make sure I'm mixing production runs.
completion_text: my last purchase of four cases had a sour off-smell. i contacted natural balance customer service, who said they hadn't received complaints about that batch, would pass information along to their tech department, and send me a coupon for one case. however, as it's a natural product, variation was expected. they suggested returning it to the retailer, which would involve paying for shipping three times - receiving, sending back, and receiving again - making it an expensive process. i've fed this variety to my three cats for a year, alternating with natural balance ultra, and they loved it. this batch is the only one they'll eat when extremely hungry; all other batches had a clean fresh smell. i'm disappointed in the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium-priced product. i won't be buying from natural balance again and will use the coupon locally, ensuring i mix production runs.

prompt: Rewrite this paragraph while keeping the same tone and meaning.
input_text: I have 7 dogs.  All various breeds and sizes.  I was looking for a brand without additives that all my dogs would benefit from.  I have a few that need to lose weight.  Wellness makes the best product.  I buy the small bites for my little ones....pieces are small and they love it.  I but the Healthy weightCORE for my "dieters" and mix it with canned green beans or peas and carrots.  So far my Golden, who was an overweight rescue at 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds -- she's been on this food for about 7 months.  I buy the original CORE version for my baby bulldog, who had a lot of gas.  No more smells and ripples in the night!  Amazon has the best price for Wellness. And its shipped right to my home -- no lugging big bags back and forth.  Yes, it's more expensive than the other stuff--but it really works.  And that will cut down on future vet bills.  All my dogs are healthy and have nice shiny coats.  Priceless!  Wellness now has a SIMPLE version for those dogs who suffer with food allergies.  A family member has a little Teddy Bear with severe skin issues -- she'd scratch until raw and bloody.  She switched to the SIMPLE version of Wellness and has been itch free ever since.  Again...great brand!
completion_text: i have seven dogs, each with their own unique breed and size. i was searching for a pet food without additives that all my dogs could benefit from. some of them need to lose weight, so i rely on wellness's excellent products. for my smaller dogs, i buy the small bites they love, while mixing the healthy weight core formula with canned vegetables for my dieters. my golden retriever, an overweight rescue at 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds after being on this food for about seven months. i purchase the original core version for my baby bulldog, who previously suffered from gas issues   no more smelly nights! amazon offers the best price for wellness and delivers it straight to my doorstep, eliminating the need to lug heavy bags around. while it's pricier than other options, wellness truly works and can reduce future vet bills. my dogs are all healthy with shiny coats, which is priceless. additionally, wellness now offers a simple formula for dogs with food allergies. a family member's teddy bear, who suffered from severe skin issues, has been itch-free since switching to the simple version of wellness   another testament to this great brand!

But, it's a natural product, and variation "was to be expected". They suggested I return it to the retailer. Paying for shipping 3 times (receiving, sending back, receiving again) for a heavy product like this makes it very expensive.
I've fed this variety to my 3 cats for a year (alternate with Natural Balance Ultra), and they have always loved it. They will only eat this batch if they are very very hungry. I can barely stand to open the cans. All other batches had a clean fresh smell.
I'm disapointed with the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium priced product. (I have 3 cats). I won't buy from Natural Balance again. I'll use the coupon locally, and make sure I'm mixing production runs.
